languages.text: {n}Регент задумчиво почесывает скудную бороду перепончатыми пальцами.{/n} "Пожалуй, мы можем с этим смириться. В конечном счете, именно вы спасли дитя. Раз так — ответьте, что именно произошло на Эурак-V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Регент задумчиво почесывает скудную бороду перепончатыми пальцами.{/n} "Пожалуй, мы можем с этим смириться. В конечном счете, именно вы спасли дитя. Раз так — ответьте, что именно произошло на Эурак-V?"

languages.text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"
languages.original_text: {n}Регент задумчиво почесывает скудную бороду перепончатыми пальцами.{/n} "Пожалуй, мы можем с этим смириться. В конечном счете, именно вы спасли дитя. Раз так — ответьте, что именно произошло на Эурак-V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The regent thoughtfully scratches his meager beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I guess we can live with that. In the end, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell me — what exactly happened on Eurac-V?"

{n}The regent thoughtfully scratches his meager beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I guess we can live with that. In the end, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell me — what exactly happened on Eurac-V?"

{n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell me — what exactly happened on Eurac-V?"

{n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell me — what exactly happened on Eurac-V?"

{n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

languages.text: {n}摄政王伸出带蹼的手指，深思般地捋着稀稀落落的胡须。{/n}“我想，这一点我们可以接受，毕竟是您救了圣子一命。既然如此，请告诉我们，在欧拉克五号星上究竟发生了什么事情？”
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}摄政王伸出带蹼的手指，深思般地捋着稀稀落落的胡须。{/n}“我想，这一点我们可以接受，毕竟是您救了这孩子一命。既然如此，请告诉我，在欧拉克五号星上究竟发生了什么事情？”

languages.text: {n}El regente se rasca la escasa barba con sus dedos palmeados.{/n} «Supongo que puedo tolerarlo. A fin de cuentas, rescató a la Niña. Dicho esto, cuéntenos: ¿qué pasó exactamente en Eurac V?».
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El regente se rasca la escasa barba con sus dedos palmeados.{/n} «Supongo que puedo tolerarlo. A fin de cuentas, rescató a la niña. Dicho esto, cuénteme: ¿qué pasó exactamente en Eurac-V?».

languages.text: {n}摂政は物思いにふけりながら、蜘蛛のような指で乏しい髭を掻いた。{/n}「それは大目に見てもいいだろう。結局のところ、子供を助けたのはあなただったのだから。では、教えてもらいたい…ユーラック・Vでいったい何があったのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}摂政は物思いにふけりながら、蜘蛛のような指で乏しい髭を掻いた。{/n}「それは大目に見てもいいだろう。結局のところ、子供を助けたのはあなただったのだから。では、教えてもらいたい…ユーラック・Vでいったい何があったのだ？」

languages.text: {n}Der Regent kratzt sich nachdenklich mit schwimmhäutigen Fingern am dünnen Bart.{/n} "Ich denke, das ist akzeptabel. Immerhin habt Ihr das Kind gerettet. Sagt uns also – was genau ist auf Eurac V geschehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Regent kratzt sich nachdenklich mit schwimmhäutigen Fingern am dünnen Bart.{/n} "Ich denke, das ist akzeptabel. Immerhin habt Ihr das Kind gerettet. Sagt mir also – was genau ist auf Eurac-V geschehen?"

languages.text: {n}L'air pensif, le régent caresse sa barbe clairsemée de ses doigts palmés.{/n} « C'est acceptable. Après tout, vous avez sauvé l'Enfant. Puisque c'est ainsi, racontez-nous ce qu'il s'est passé exactement sur Eurac-V. »
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air pensif, le régent caresse sa barbe clairsemée de ses doigts palmés.{/n} « C'est acceptable. Après tout, vous avez sauvé l'enfant. Puisque c'est ainsi, racontez-nous ce qu'il s'est passé exactement sur Eurac-V. »

languages.text: {n}Naip, perdeli parmaklarını dalgın bir tavırla dağınık sakallarının arasında gezdiriyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum bunu tolere edebiliriz. Nihayetinde çocuğu kurtaran sizdiniz. Bu durumda söyleyin bize, Eurac V'te tam olarak ne yaşandı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The regent pensively scratches his scant beard with webbed fingers.{/n} "I suppose we can tolerate that. After all, it was you who rescued the child. If so, tell us — what exactly happened on Eurac V?"
